nodes.text: Duja was a human female who was a close friend and former handmaiden of Senator Padmé Amidala of Naboo. She helped Padmé to decipher an unintelligible communication from an angry ambassador (a potential diplomatic crisis) realizing the ambassador simply hadn't liked the way Padmé pronounced the name of a fellow envoy. She died looking into a Separatist factory on Mokivj in 19 BBY, the final year of the Clone Wars.
